markers.description: DESCRIBED BY NATIONAL GEODETIC SURVEY 1996 (AJL) THE STATION IS LOCATED NEAR THE SOUTHEAST SIDE OF THE ISLAND OF DOMINICAN REPUBLIC, NEAR LA ROMANA, SOUTHEAST OF AND ACROSS THE ROAD FROM THE COMMANDANTE OF THE NAVY OFFICE AT LA ROMANA PORT. OWNERSHIP--STATE OF DOMINICAN REPUBLIC.  NOTE--THIS STATION IS A BENCH MARK.  LOCATED 8.1 M (26.6 FT) NORTH OF THE NORTH SIDE OF THE SOUTH PIER WALL, 3.8 M (12.5 FT) EAST OF A STONE WALL ON THE EAST SIDE OF THE ROAD IN FRONT OF THE OFFICE, AND THE MONUMENT IS ABOUT 2.0 M (6.6 FT) BELOW THE LEVEL OF THE ROAD AND PROJECTING 7-CM ABOVE THE ROCK SURFACE.  BY R.G.  HAYES
markers.setting: SET IN TOP OF CONCRETE MONUMENT

markers.description: DESCRIBED BY NATIONAL GEODETIC SURVEY 1996 (AJL) THE STATION IS LOCATED NEAR THE SOUTH-SOUTHEAST SIDE OF THE ISLAND OF DOMINICAN REPUBLIC, NEAR SANTO DOMINGO, AT THE DE LAS AMERICAS INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT. MENDEZ LEGURA ON ARRIVAL, (ESCORT REQUIRED) .  NOTE--COLONEL LEGURA IS THE HEAD OF AIRPORT OPERATIONS FOR ALL OF THE DOMINICAN REPUBLIC, (ALL 3 AIRPORTS) .  THE STATION IS A BENCHMARK DISK FROM GEODESICO INTER-AMERICANO STAMPED AS6D IGU 1972.  IT IS ACROSS FROM TAXIWAY E1 IN THE SOUTHWEST CORNER OF RUNWAY 17-35.  NOTE--NO MEASUREMENTS ARE AVAILABLE, ALL INFORMATION IS BASED ON A RUNWAY END DIAGRAM.
markers.setting: SET IN A PAVEMENT SUCH AS STREET, SIDEWALK, CURB, ETC.
markers.stability: MARK OF QUESTIONABLE OR UNKNOWN STABILITY

markers.description: DESCRIBED BY NATIONAL GEODETIC SURVEY 1996 (AJL) THE STATION IS LOCATED NEAR THE NORTH SIDE OF THE ISLAND OF DOMINICAN REPUBLIC, NEAR PUERTO PLATA, AT THE PUERTO PLATA PORT.  NEAR AND NORTH OF THE OLD FORT AT PUERTO PLATA PORT, ON THE NORTH POINT OF THE PORT, (MALECON) , NORTH OF AND OUTSIDE OF THE STONE RAILING, THE STATION IS A ROUND CONCRETE MONUMENT AND THE DISK HAS BEEN REMOVED, THE STEM OF THE DISK IS STILL IN GOOD CONDITION BUT NEEDS A DATUM POINT. OWNERSHIP--PUERTO PLATA PORT AUTHORITY.  NOTE--THIS STATION IS A TIDAL BENCH MARK.  LOCATED 4.0 M (13.1 FT) NORTH OF A STONE WALKWAYS NORTH EDGE ON THE NORTHERN MOST POINT NORTH OF THE OLD FORT, AND THE STATION IS ABOUT 0.3 M (1.0 FT) BELOW THE LEVEL OF THE WALKWAY AND FLUSH WITH THE GROUND SURFACE.  BY R.G.  HAYES
markers.setting: SET IN TOP OF CONCRETE MONUMENT
markers.stability: MAY HOLD, BUT OF TYPE COMMONLY SUBJECT TOSURFACE MOTION

markers.description: DESCRIBED BY NATIONAL GEODETIC SURVEY 1996 (AJL) THE STATION IS LOCATED NEAR THE SOUTHEAST SIDE OF THE ISLAND OF DOMINICAN REPUBLIC, NEAR LA ROMANA, AT THE PUNTA DE AGUILA LA ROMANA AIRPORT.  IN A GRASS TRIANGLE NORTHWEST OF THE NORTHWEST END OF RUNWAY END 12, EAST OF A GUARD SHACK, NEAR THE CENTER OF 3 PAVED ROADS FORMING THE TRIANGLE, SET IN A DRILL HOLE IN A 2 X 2-FOOT AREA OF ROCK OUTCROP. NOTE--THIS STATION WAS SELECTED AS A (PACS) . BY R.G.  HAYES
markers.stability: MOST RELIABLE AND EXPECTED TO HOLDPOSITION/ELEVATION WELL
